body_html:
Additional info:

  • Ran with tf.data api, NCCL replicated (tried all parameter servers) and staging areas on both the CPU and GPU.
  • The model is a fully convolutional network with skip connections, like resnet.
body_text:
Additional info:

Ran with tf.data api, NCCL replicated (tried all parameter servers) and staging areas on both the CPU and GPU.
The model is a fully convolutional network with skip connections, like resnet.
body:
Additional info:
- Ran with `tf.data` api, NCCL replicated (tried all parameter servers) and staging areas on both the CPU and GPU.
- The model is a fully convolutional network with skip connections, like resnet.
